guide.title: NTP Configuration Guide for Gentoo Infrastructure Servers
guide.abstract: This guide documents how NTP should be configured on Gentoo Infrastructure servers.

chapter.title: Gentoo Infrastructure guidelines for running NTP

body.p: NTP is required to be configured and running on all Gentoo Infrastructure servers. Below are sample configuration settings for NTP:
body.pre:
logfile /var/log/ntpd.log driftfile /var/state/ntp.drift
# Name of the servers ntpd should sync with # Please respect the access policy as stated by the responsible person. #server ntp.example.tld iburst server ntp.ctr.columbia.edu server ntp0.cornell.edu server sundial.columbia.edu server timex.cs.columbia.edu
